36 enum class LogLevel : unsigned int {
37  Critical = 100,
38  Error = 80,
39  Warning = 60,
40  Info = 40,
41  Debug = 20,
42  Unset = 0
43 };

60 class LogRecord {
61  friend Logger;
62 public:
63  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
67 
69  LogRecord();
70  ~LogRecord();
72  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
75 
78  inline const GString& category() const { return m_category; }
79 
82  inline LogLevel level() const { return m_level; }
83 
86  inline const GString& message() const { return m_message; }
87 
90  inline const QDateTime& timestamp() const { return m_timestamp; }
92 protected:
93  inline void setCategory(const char* category) { m_category = category; }
94  inline void setLevel(LogLevel level) { m_level = level; }
95  inline void setMessage(const char* message) { m_message = message; }
96  inline void setTimestamp(const QDateTime& timestamp) { m_timestamp = timestamp; }
97 
98 private:
99  GString m_category;
100  LogLevel m_level = LogLevel::Unset;
101  GString m_message;
102  QDateTime m_timestamp;
103 };
